oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Young, unmarried women and girls must hide themselves from the rain. (L VII.-23. 8032 and 8031 rev.). 1) |han=kass'o heard this story from his maternal grandmother (=kammi), 2) p.8031v: on the anger of the rain; an old woman tells the children about the doings of unmarried women, 3) This story is found in Book VIII-23.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Young unmarried women and girls must be silent and hide from the rain
